title: Korea Elementary Grade 3-6 English Lessons PPT
description:
English Lessons for Korean Elementary Students

You are probably using a different textbook but the lesson PPTs and games should be useful.  Typically the textbooks all have the same lessons, just in a different order. So you can use the list below to figure out which lessons to download.

Admittedly some of the earlier lessons are pretty crappy but the later ones were normally enjoyed by my students. Sorry if any videos are missing, I'm sure you could find then on Youtube pretty easily.

Please be patient with the seeding because my computer is not always on. It would probably be better for you to just download the lessons that you need as opposed to everything.

Hopefully this can help you with your lesson planning :)
